values: OKAY -- so i am going to write in here, b/c Kareena insists, and because as of today, i am grounded for a month and this might be amusing until i am able to go out again.

hm i havent written in a long time. too much has happend to write about; but i went to this hot party on Saturday.. uh and i dont know what else..ha maybe i will update when i can remember more stuff.. <3

Ew. There are rats in my house. My dad was cleaning out the garage and found a little mouse/rat thing and so he put it in a container...he continued to clean the garage and later found 4 more mice/rat things..and yea so they are in this container and they are gross, and you can see all the fleas on them and shit. BLEH and i want to get them out of the house b/c im afraid they will escape and get lost in the house, but my dad doesnt want to let them out until he can take them further away from our house tommorrow morning... -- I was putting on makeup before i went out tonight and so i was sitting on my bathroom countertop to get closer to the mirror and what do you know...I was sitting on a tube of toothpaste the entire time; not only did i waste the whole tube but i got it on my pants. Toothpaste is pretty gross and hard to clean up when its all gooey and not dried yet so i just wiped it all up with a towel. yea...i couldnt put the towel in the laundry so i just threw the whole thing away. maybe my mom wont notice. ahahahahhaha :D two interesting stories kids. ENJOY.

It seems alot of people here are slow....hmmm :/ I got my 'progress report' Friday, and I have a C in English. ugh FUCK THAT. I have to get the thing signed too and I don't know what I'm going to do. My mom and dad are going to flip out on me. I thought about forging the signature but then I don't want to get caught, and getting it signed is a whole nother test grade. WTF. I have been sitting home, watching movie, eating, and doing homework. What a life. But yea I have made some more friends. Cool. But they are not like friends I hang out with. They are just there and they talk to me. Ha and I heard I was called down to my counselor at RBR. I should stop skipping. :D Nothing.
Alot of people are telling me how my name is announced in their classes. I didn't take pictures when I was in NJ. I didn't get to see some special people. Upsetting.

NJ was really fun.

<3 i love you.

hmm haha well im updating for Brianne.


school is boring still. im going to nj on friday but amy wont be there b/c her plane is stupid and it comes in at 1am and there would be no one to pick her up..ugh

and yea nothing intersting.




good night

Friday - was supposed to go to Fiesta Friday, this club, but i ended up sitting home and relaxing. Not bad. I heard alot of people got food poisoning there anyways. Satudrday - Courtney came over, walked around, we went to Walmart, chilled there, went back to her house, and then i slept over. Cool. Sunday - Courtney woke me up at like 8:30 bc she thought i had to be at church at 9, but i didnt have to go until 10, so we hung out for a little and then i went home at 945 and got ready for church :D I went to church with my mom and then we ran some errands to get stuff and now i am finally home and i have a shit load of homework, but i hope schoool is cancelled tomorrow bc of this tropical storm coming. Yay. And then New Jersey on Friday! <33

AHHHHHHHHH


i am missing the firemans fair.


this is depressing. :(





</3

School. Met some more new kids. Nice. We had another fucking firedrill and had to stand outside in the 90 degree weather for a half hour again...we had one yesterday. And once again it was a false alarm. haha damn but im glad whoever keeps pulling the alarm should keep on doing his job, cuz my Foods class is sooo BOrring. So yea, we stood outside fo a half hour, couldn't find anyone interesting or anyone I knew so i called PALMER<3. I love you! We talked. It was fun. :D Gosh and im jealous, all the girls i know all have boyfriends and everyone is always holding their boyfriends hands in the hallways, blah. but i mean there are like a select few hot guys that are not rednecks...ehhh hah after school i came home, ate a nice brownie and enjoyed my cable..bc we just got it today and just as i turned on the tv, COurtney came over and so i changed and we walked to some strip mall thing and we shopped, got some stuff, and then walking home she stepped on a stick and got a cut, so we went home so she could clean it off. I waved to some random kids skating, they were cute. :) Then we walked to Walmart met up this kid, chilled there and then went to Wendy's to eat dinner. YUM. then we walked all that shit off and came home. I waved to some random kids on the way home again, and we ended up talking to these kids, and somehow they knew who i was...? yea now i am here. YAY :DDDDD <333

school is boring. yesterday in gym i told this kid he had really pretty eyes, because he does...they are like AHHH GORGEOUS and they are ike turquoise and yea i thought i scared him. but today he talked to me and i actaully found out his name. hes cute met some other kids and this girl and her brother that just moved here from NY. really cool. yay i can't wait until labor day weekend. i love you amy.<3 last night i was up until 1 tryping up some paper bc of course, i waited until the last night. psssh today we took our ID pictures and i was the last one to go so i got to help the guy hand them back out to kids so he printed me an extra one, so if i lost my other one i wont have to buy another one for like $5. ahhh hahah arnet i special? i get two ugly looking picturess of myself to carry around.......................... I am really tired

hm school today, had gym. OH SHIT we had to run around the track 6 times.. PSHAAA yea so i was not prepared for that but atleast i did the 6 laps within the 20 minutes. UM K after school courtney came and rang my little doorbell and after 20 minutes of meee getting dressed again we walked in the HEAT to meet this kid Spencer,a nd then to WALMART<3 its like their all time storee here..the SOUth love them some WALMART. yea Courtney had to bitch at some kid about his gf and such/ anyways...now i am home and gross and sweaty and i have homnework and im too lazy to do it and i need to shower and yes, aren't i always complainng.. and i think theree is a party this weekend. i dont know. PEACE OUT DAWGWWG <3

hmm school is alright. goes by kinda fast actaully by the end of the day today i was like HMM ITS THURSDAY, TOMORROW IS FRIDAY. WOO HOO.. yes...


i made some cute friends.

my mom is also going back to nuevo jersey on Tuesday. I am not going with her bc i have HIGH SCHOOOOOL. and if i miss like a day of school they hunt you down and make you do lots of work and fail you. actaully i dont know but they are like DONT MISS SCHOOL MORE THAN TWICE OR THERE ARE CONSEQUENCES. yes, haha them country FOLK,,as;d


 hah now i need to finish decorating some folder for my honors english class cuz the teacher is crazy and was like DECORATE this folder and make it SCREAM REBEKAH! or you fail, and have it done by Tuesday. so Yes I need to do that.


I am also being harassed by my freind Nicole who like mommys me and makes me do homework. BOoo  and some NEGROES said i look like a 6th grader in school today... now do i looke that YOUNG? GOD DAMNMNit


HOT BOYS! <3433

why is everyone obsessed with playing poker?



- i had my first day of school today.








<b>kill me now.

So yesterday Hurricane Charley hit. I was up all night b/c of the rain and wind and then woke up again at 9 when fire trucks were going by and the wind was rattling the windows. Yea so i look for my parents, and they weren't home. I called their cell phones and they had both left them home. Hmm yea two hours later they came home, from food shopping. The streets were totally flooded with 4 feet of water, there are trees in the street, power lines down, winds at like 60 miles an hour, and my parents are out grocery shopping. pfff so they came home and we watched the news. The whole thing passed in like a few hours...not that bad. After that i sat around some more and watched tv. My life. Tomorrow I have school. How exciting. So yea my one month of summer is finally over; and it went by so fast.. haah yea, and everyday i get the same questions: How is NC? You going to the same school as the Erbs? Are you okay from the hurricane? North Carolina sucks, Still sucks, Will always suck. I have no friends. No, I live basically on the other side of town from the Erbs, we aren't going to the same high school. Yes, I am okay. Obviously, I doubt I would be talking to you on AIM if my house was torn apart.

the smallest puppy died. :( how sad. so i have been sitting home for the past two days, yes my life is very productive. so i talked to my mom yesterday and she told me how the puppies would not be old enough Labor Day weekend to bring them back to New Jersey and she was planning on going up and staying for the week, not just a weekend. I have school starting Monday. So she said she isn't going up then, and that i will probably be going up on Christmas Break, which is like in forever. I am very disappointed. >: blah blah i don't remember what else i wanted to write. whatever. one of the kids that i met the first day, came over today, he asked to cut our lawn and do yard work. i talked to him a little after he was done, while my mom was getting the money to pay him. hha haha yea this may sound lame, but i also asked if i could go back to new jersey to go to the firemans' fair and miss school that week. UGhh asfhgblahh I really don't like this place. School: 4 days.

Well my dog like went into labor last night and my mom got worried b/c the puppies weren't coming out but she was in pain so she brought her to the vet. They said she wasnt due for another 3 days but since she was in pain they gave her a shot to force the births. So yea this morning around 10 my dog, Roxy, had 4 puppies. 3 are strong and healthy and the 4th is small and weak. Yea we are still trying to get her to drink milk but she can't like swallow so we doubt she will make it. But,

thats the small one... :\

 

yea i suck at taking pictures...hmm

ha this weekend was the major, TAX FREE WEEKEND. Where everything is yes, tax-free, including clothes which are taxed here in the nice state of North Carolina. So yea, went shopping for school supplies and then went to the mall. Big mall, but barely any stores there I like. Surprisingly my mom bought me some new jeans and skirts. I convinced her because later on there will be tax on clothes. I also had to get a graphing calculator which was $150.00 hahah Schedule: - Orientation: Tuesday, Aug, 10 - School Starts: Monday, Aug. 16 - My life was over: Thursday, July 29 now i am going to go and read my new issue of Star and eat. ha i love the world of celebrity gossip..hmm, what a night...

haha yea my scanner is a peice of shit and it takes too long to scan each one so i used my digital camera and took pictures of the pictures. haha :D

 

they are under the cut. so click and enjoy them even if they are old and retarded looking.

/\ camera whore as usual at the Shadowbrook<3  \/

ARE WE IN THE JUNGLE?!

ahahah very SEXy ladies...

lining up before we walked in at graduation.

aw deanna..haha

at brianne's graduation party.

 

not quite sure what she is doing..?

 AWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWW

the beaches here are nice; real nice. my parents came home early this morning, and of course i was still up, so i got shit from them. today -- i saw my counselor for high school and got school all taken care of, and i have orientation on Tuesday and start school the 16th (Monday). they have block scheduling here. still not quite sure what that is. the high school is nice, :/ and their mascot is the eagle, the screaming eagles, haha and their colors are maroon and silver/white. YAY... also, i finally got my graduation/shadowbrook pictures developed, after like a month from graduation. i will put them up later when i want to. life still sucks.

I am officially bored out of my mind and miserable beyond belief.








It sucks. Life sucks. You prob suck too.

Yesterday my parents left. They said they would rent me movies but of course at the last minute my dad changed his mind. We don't have cable yet, only one channel. So they left me and I have nothing to do. Basically my whole day consisted of eating and watching Soaps. haha man are they intense. Yea and then this kid came to my house to say 'goodbye' b/c he was going on vaca today. It was the same kid my mom like screamed at the first day, to meet me. I thought he would be a little freaked out.. The Second Day home alone. Nothing to do but go on the computer and watch my one channel. I wanted to wake up and go for a run this morning but of course, I am a lazy ass and couldn't get up until 12.. North Carolina Blows.

everything is basically taken care of here. my parents are driving back to NJ on Tuesday to pick up some more shit, and they are leaving me here. shit. that should be alot of fun, since I have so many friends here... i really hate this.

Didn't get to sleep until 5 and then my parents started to yell at me at 8 this morning to start packing.

Packed all day, just stopped, and we still aren't done.

 

Ughfg grfd it sucks and my parents told me how my room is smaller in the new house..wtfd hgsdflgjlgf

 

 

 

hhaa yea they are old, but they are cute<33

I love you girls so much, I don't know what I would have done without any of you.

This weekend was real fucked up. My parents came home last night around 1. Today I had to stay home all day and pack. Most of the furniture is packed up except for the beds and tvs. It really sucks to move, and packing is annoying. Dave also moved today. :( I will miss him. And once I move I have to start school soon. They start school in August there so I only get 1 month of summer this year, b/c we got out so late. Nothing exciting. Blah.

Yea so I'm not really allowed on because of the $2500 phone bill I got. Yes, $2500. Anyways I took my laptop back and I have been cleaning all day and packing. The U-Haul truck my parents got was too small so they have to make two trips so today they left and aren't coming home until Monday. And they said I am not allowed to leave the house... pssh WOoo Alright I'm out. <3

Right now I am at Dana's house.

Last night she threw a surprise Going Away Party. Haha but I kind of knew about it bc of people giving it away, hah

Anyways, it was fun and I got to see alot of people I haven't seen since graduation. Dave was there too.<3 Thanks, you guys for all the presents.

I love all of you<3

And Thank You Dana!! I love you babes and I won't forget you.

Thank you, Nicole and De for all the presents, I love you guys so much <33

It's too bad Caroline couldn't have been there. :(

I miss you.

Now I have to go eat breakfast.

Las night me and Dana went to Dave's house. As we were driving there it started to rain and when we pulled up to his house he was standing outside with two umbrellas, one for each of us. He's such a gentleman.<3333 Ugh god Nicole called like 5 times at 9 this morning to wake me up. I finally got up at 9:40 when De called. Took a shower and then went to the WoodBridge Mall. I was really short on cash. I had a 5 dollar bill, which I used to buy lunch, and a gift card with $18.87 on it. I bought a sub, two bags of chips, a cookie, two shirts, and a pair of underwear. After the mall we went to Marshall's to get some other stuff. Hahah we had some good times there. After that we dropped Dana and Deanna off and then Nicole and I went to chill with Jon and Ryan. We found them at Austin's house in his pool, even though Austin was at the beach. Nicole also pushed me in the shallow end when I was bending over to sick my hands in. So then I pushed her in and then Ryan had to push me in all the way. So I just went in with my clothes. Had to ride home soaking wet and now I am home. Going to Dana's house soon after I shower. Hmm.....

Bored, waiting for Noelle to pick me up.

I was supposed to go to the movies yesterday with everyone but of couruse I have to get yelled at by my parents bc I asked for money. They gave me $30 the beginning of this week but I spent it all..not quite sure on what. But yea so I had no money and so I couldn't go.

Caroline also left this morning and I didn't get to see her.

So I sat home all day and then took a nap bc I went to sleep at like 6 the night before.

Nicole and De went back to the movies, so it was just me and Dana last night.

We just chilled with some people.

Today, I am going to the beach with Dana and Noelle and staying down for the little Driftwood Sleepover they have every year.

Fun. Fun.

Ugh, God and I don't know why I am soo sore all over. I don't do anything..hah

DAVE IS HOME!<3 DEANNA IS HOME!<3 Everything is going pretty good. This week started out slow and kind of miserable with the rain and all, but it turned out good. Caroline is leaving tomorrow again, to go to the Outer Banks, and I prob won't see her when I move. I will miss you Caroline, I love you! <3

i didnt feel like writing an entry but Caroline insisted, so she wrote it for me. Haha SummerCutie55: okay first you came to my house and we chatted and then we walked to 7/11 and got slurpees and then walked back to my house and on the way back you got yelled at for littering and then dana came over and we played monopoly and then you guys went home cause i had to eat dinner and then we went to the movies and made fun of the girls but i forgot, before we went to the movies you got fries and dana got salad works and you brought them into the movie and then you went home and then you came over my house for a little and then my mom drove you home and then people came over and then your day was over.

So yesterday was 7/11. 7 11 Day. Also Momma Frangipane's Birthday!!<33 Woke up around 11:30 when Nicole called me to go to the beach with her and Dana. We stopped by the 7 11 in Little Silver, haha it was crazy in there. After that we went to the 7 11 in Sea Bright, but it sucked. hha there was nothing there. But I was hungry so I bought some cheese cubes<33 Blah Blah we did what we usually do at the beach. We walked down towards Ship Ahoy and as we were walking we past Sea Bright Beach Club and I saw a kid with bright red hair that kind of looked like Alex Henderson. So I was like 'Hey, Alex goes to this beach club.' So yea we kept walking and then of course I spotted some CUTE boys. hahaha and I saw a kid with some more bright red hair. [no offense Alex hahaha] So I went over to see if it was Alex. It was, and he was with Alexander Hovnanian, Satchel and some other cute boys. We hung out with Alex and Alexander. We tried to go in the water but it was gross with jellyfish eggs. When I came home Ryan Korn said we could come over. So I told my parents and I was getting ready and shit and then my dad always has to get involved with things and make everything fucked up. So then he said it was too late for me to go out. It was 9:00. So I sat home on my fat ass for the 3rd night in a row. My parents really want to make my summer suck. Boy has this last week been shit. I just can't stand these people. God I really do hate my life. But on a good note, Caroline came home last night!!! <333 I missed you soo much babes. However, she is leaving again this Saturday for the Outer Banks, and she is going to miss when I move. :( I love all of you girls so much. Dana - Deanna - Caroline - Nicole <3
My life sucks. My family sucks. FUCK EVERYTHING AND EVERYONE. I can't take all this drama.

De, Nicole, and Dana came over yesterday. We ordered SaladWorks and they ate. I'm a little short on cash so I didn't order anything. ha After eating Ryan and Austin came over and we went swimming. We swam. Ryan went home. Nicole went home. De, Dana, Austin, and I walked to 7 11. De went home from there, and then Austin went home. Me and Dana chilled at my house and then I showered and we went to De's house b/c it was her last night here and I might not see her if I move. Kate B was there too and so we just walked around as usual and then went to 7 11 for the 2nd time. We met up with Gary and Tim...and then we saw Herch and Chris. We talked to them for awhile and then I had to go home. I had to walk home so Gary walked me part of the way. Have fun in Minnesota Deanna!!<3 Good luck and buy me something nice from the Mall of America!

hmm yesterday i woke up at around 12. I had to clean my room and then start packing. I talked to dana and then made plans to go out, went to her house and chilled there and then decided to go to the mall. We went to the mall, ate, and then saw the Stepford Wives. Ha wow and guys kept coming up to us, guess it was b/c Dana looked so HOT. haha yea but they were all ugly. These two other kids were from Brooklyn but had a summer house in Deal. heh After the movies we went back to Dana's house, had some fun, and then went out. We walked around and went to Austin's house and chilled there for awhile and then walked to Dunkin Donuts. Around 12:30 we went back to Dana's house. I slept over. We didn't get to sleep until 4 am. So this morning we woke up around 1:30 and slept through 4 phone calls, but finally woke up when Austin called. He came over and we hung out and then ordered Chinese foodd. YES! <33 Finally I just got home and I need to shower, I smell. WOW and my mom said my curfew is 10 b/c of what happened the other night. BULLSHIT. *New Pictures* http://www.worldisround.com/home/fivesimply/index.html

wow you fucking sluts need to quit talking shit about me and spreading rumors. and dont think i dont know who is the one making up all that gay shit. worry about your own fucking life and stay out of my business really sucks if you have to make up rumors to make yourself look better so fuck off whore, you dont know anything about me and my friends and you have something to say, say it to my fucking face you ugly skank

The weekend was pretty good. including last night, even though i got grounded b/c i came home from red bank at 1. Dana and i were supposed to catch the 12:22 train home but we lost track of time..? ha yea it happens alot... it sucked.. i hate getting yelled at. so today i had to stay with my mom and go to my aunts house and deal with all my cousins and my whole mom's side and their crazy korean ways. And no one speaks english, except to talk to me and it just gave me a headache. yea, but Rebekah usually doesn't get grounded that long so i got my cell phone and laptop back tonight. nothing to do!! shit...im gunna take a shower and find something or someone to do. heh lAterrr <33
i think its final, moving date: July 22.

Woke up at 11 today after Dana called me, twice. Went to the beach with Dana and Nicole. De was supposed to meet us there after her othro appt. but she said it was raining in Shrewsbury so she didn't want to go, but it wasn't raining at the beach...? Yea, we had some good times at the beach. Wow and we ended up at Water's edge b/c we wanted Pina Coladas and then we got food at their snack bar. We stayed there for awhile b/c we thought De was coming but then she didn't so we had to walk all the way back to Big Monmouth. After the beach we went home around 5 and I got ready to go out to celebrate Deanna's birthday. Went to De's house at 6 and then went to Applebee's with Kate, Dana, Deanna, Nicole, Courtney and Megan (you my girl SPANKY!). Aw, no Carol<333 We were soo loud at the place and the waitress spillled frruckin iced tea on me and didn't even say sorry or help me, she just brought out napkins and dabbed the table. yea, real helpful. so i had to walk around the mall with a wet skirt and wet underwear. haha we walked around the mall for awhile and then went to our movie of DODGEBALL. lmao, the movie was real funny, and after awhile we noticed we were really the only people laughing in the audience. We had some good times. :D <333 Iloveallyougirls. and you are so special De, having an entry named after you.

Walked around and chilled with some people then, slept over Caroline's house last night. Nicole woke up at 7 to leave b/c she had to go and babysit. The rest of us woke up at 11 and then Dana and Caroline went to Sickles to meet Ryan. De and i stayed behind and just ate and talked to Dan<333..haha then they called and told us to go to Bagel Masters. Walked there and ate some more. Got home around 2 and then took a shower b/c i smelled real bad and hadn't washed my hair since the beach the day before. :/ haha yes, i am dirty. it's all good. was supposed to go to nicole's house b/c she had some people over but i was too tired, so i took a nap. Woke up at 8 and been sitting home. BORED. but it's only one night...... oh well, and HOLY SHIT my neck & back hurt like a mother fucker b/c i had to sleep on the floor with De at Caroline's. Caroline is leaving tomorrow. HAVE FUN IN CALIFORNIA, CAROLINE! <333 I WILL MISS YOU WHILE YOU'RE GONE. muchlove<3

last night i hung out with dana, we did the usual, went to 7 11 and then ate. ahah we were so hungry so we bought food there and ate outside. I got this pound cake thing and some combos and a soda. wow we looked like such hobos sitting on crates eating outside. haha Came home at 11, early night, and then i was real tired so i went to sleep. Today, i woke up at 10:00 and then went to the beach all day with Deanna, and Dana and saw Caroline a few times at Little Monmouth, but we really didn't hang out with her, except when she said she had drinks and food. ha then we just walked around and saw Tim, and Herch at Big Monmouth. We also saw Steve and Greg and chilled with them back at Little Monmouth. Carol letf early at like 4 and our ride wasn't coming until 5 so we just sat there. [CODY<33] Wow and i am like black from tanning and going to the beach. I am def gunna be wrinkly when i get older. Once again SKIN CANCER<33 We had some cute Sand Wars where Dana shoveled sand into the bottom of my bathing suit and they both like to gang up on my and tackle me and throw sand at me. And then Deanna thought it was hilarious when she pulled me into the sand by my hair and then buried my hair. hah oh yea REAL FUCKING FUNNY!@@# Hope you liked all that sand in you ears and eye!! (: i love you girls!<3 :D ehh and my whole shower was filled with sand when i took off my bathing suit. Now i have to get dressed. Heading over to Caroline's house! muchhlove<33 !@#%%&^(!

woo I fixed that stupid date problem that kait caused... :D Yesterday, Sunday - Woke up at 10:15ish to go to that wiffle ball game thing at manson...? Didn't really understand what it was but we played wiffle ball for a little bit haha and then took a break for food. We ended up not playing agian and watching the coaches play their hardcore game of softball. After awhile alot of people left except a few and then me and Dana decided to go to the beach. We walked back to her house and then got changed and went to Little Monmouth. We were there for a little and then called Palmer b/c we knew him, Ryan, and Tim, were riding their bikes down to the beach. We met up with them, hung out and then Dana and I went back to Little Monmouth. We stayed there and went in the ocean and tanned until my parents came to pick us up. err and we missed Jackie's party.. :/ When i got home i took a shower and then went to Nicole's. Austin, Dana, Deanna, Caroline, Kaitlyn, Nicole, and Jon were there. Hung out witht those cool kids and then slept over Nicole's. We watched Maximum Overdrive, a movie Carol brought over about machines taking over everything...hahaha it was intense. Today, Monday - YES FINALLY NO SCHOOL. Just got home and out of the shower and about to get ready to go outn with another SWEET girl. haha oh baby and did i cause some drama last night.. :D it happens

wow so much has happened and it all went by really fast! i can't believe we graduated already. so last night we graduated and then went to the shadowbrook for our after party. WOooo lots of fun! Took some pictures but haven't developed them yet. Nicole put some up though on the picture sitte..some real ugly ones of me.. eh aww but everyone looked soo PRETTTYY and HANDSOME and i can't belive its all over.. :( i am going to miss everyone!! Class of '04<33 so tonight was the monmouth beach parrty. it was pretty fun. i got in a real pissy mood towards the end so i just sat and talked to steve, buddy, and pat. hmm everything else i dont remember and YAY I GOT A LAPTOP! WOOO HOOO SUMMMERRR FINALLY!! my mom also told me last night how they got the house in north carolina and that we are going to be moving by the end of July. BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOooooooooooooooooo now i am tired, good night

fuck i wrote this long entry and then it got erased. thats shit


i want to go to the Warped Tour.

<333



GRADUATION TOMORROW NIGHT.
